alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Hamilton, western Fulton and southern Herkimer Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Horseshoe Lake to 14 miles northeast of Ohio to near Cedarville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Herkimer, Little Falls, Indian Lake, Speculator, Frankfort, Dolgeville, Ohio, Lake Pleasant, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Poland, Inlet, Cold Brook, Blue Mountain Lake, Lake Eaton Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Golden Beach Campground and Moffitt Beach Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
